about.hero_subtitle: Your trusted partner for quality firewood
about.our_story_text: Since our inception, we have been committed to providing the highest quality firewood to our customers. Our passion for nature and respect for the environment drive us to select only products from sustainably managed forests.
about.our_mission_text: We strive to make wood heating accessible to everyone while preserving our forests for future generations. Every product we offer is carefully selected for its quality, efficiency, and minimal environmental impact.
about.our_commitment_text: Customer satisfaction is at the heart of our business. We are committed to providing you with quality service, reliable products, and fast, secure delivery. Our team is always available to advise and support you in your choices.
about.value_environment_desc: All our products come from sustainably managed forests, ensuring the preservation of the forest ecosystem.
about.value_quality_desc: We rigorously select our suppliers to guarantee you the highest quality products.
about.value_service_desc: Our dedicated team supports you from product selection to home delivery.
about.value_proximity_desc: We prioritize human relationships and listening to our customers to better meet their needs.
about.value_excellence_desc: We constantly strive to improve our services and the quality of our products.
about.value_passion_desc: Our passion for wood and nature is reflected in every aspect of our business.
about.our_team_desc: A passionate and experienced team dedicated to offering you the best possible service.

delivery.intro: This delivery policy details the terms and conditions for shipping your firewood and related product orders.
delivery.section_1_text: We primarily deliver to mainland France. Some remote or difficult-to-access areas may be subject to additional delays or specific conditions.
delivery.section_2_li1: Order preparation: typically within 24–48 hours after payment validation.
delivery.section_2_li2: Shipping: generally 2 to 5 business days depending on your department and carrier.
delivery.section_2_text: These times are indicative. During peak periods (winter, promotions, logistical constraints), they may be extended. In case of significant delay, we will make our best efforts to inform you.
delivery.section_3_title: Appointment Scheduling and Delivery Location Access
delivery.section_3_text: Depending on the case, the carrier may contact you to arrange a delivery time slot. It is your responsibility to ensure that access is possible and safe: road width, height, gates, closed gate, access to the drop-off location, etc.
delivery.section_4_li1: Carefully check the condition of pallets and the quantity delivered upon receipt.
delivery.section_4_li2: In case of anomaly (damaged pallet, missing product, opened package), make precise reservations on the delivery note.
delivery.section_4_li3: Confirm your reservations in writing to the carrier and our customer service, ideally with photos, within the timeframes indicated by applicable regulations.
delivery.section_5_text: The transfer of risks occurs upon delivery of products to the customer or any person authorized by them at the delivery location indicated during the order, in accordance with the general terms and conditions of sale.
delivery.section_6_text: Delivery fees are calculated based on the nature of products, the total weight of the order, and your delivery address. The exact amount is displayed before final validation of your order.
delivery.section_7_text: In case of incomplete or incorrect address, or if access is impossible or dangerous for the carrier, delivery may be rescheduled and additional fees may be charged. It is the customer's responsibility to provide complete and accurate access information.

privacy.intro: The protection of your personal data is essential. This policy explains what information we collect, for what purposes, and how we secure it.
privacy.section_1_li1: Account information: name, first name, email address, phone number.
privacy.section_1_li2: Delivery information: postal address, address supplements.
privacy.section_1_li3: Order information: products ordered, amounts, purchase history.
privacy.section_1_li4: Connection and browsing data: pages viewed, technical identifiers, connection time.
privacy.section_2_li1: Contract execution: order management, delivery, invoicing.
privacy.section_2_li2: Compliance with legal obligations: accounting, fraud prevention, data retention.
privacy.section_2_li3: Legitimate interest: improving user experience, site security.
privacy.section_2_li4: Consent: sending commercial communications, use of certain cookies.
privacy.section_3_li1: Creation and management of your customer account.
privacy.section_3_li2: Processing and tracking of your orders (preparation, delivery, after-sales service).
privacy.section_3_li4: Improving the quality of our services and securing the site.
privacy.section_4_text: Your data is intended for authorized internal services and certain service providers acting on our behalf (carriers, IT providers, payment providers, etc.), only to the extent necessary for their missions.
privacy.section_5_text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against any loss, destruction, alteration or unauthorized access. Access to data is limited to only those who need it in the course of their duties.
privacy.section_6_text: The site may use cookies and similar technologies to improve navigation, measure audience or personalize content. Some cookies are necessary for the site to function, others require your consent. You can manage your preferences via your browser settings.
privacy.section_7_text: Your data is retained for the period necessary for the purposes for which it is collected and, where applicable, for the applicable legal limitation periods. Beyond that, it is deleted or archived anonymously.
privacy.section_8_p1: Under the conditions provided by applicable regulations, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, limit processing, port your data and object. You can also define directives regarding the fate of your data after your death.
privacy.section_8_p2: To exercise your rights, you can contact our customer service via the Contact page. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.

returns.intro: This policy specifies the terms for returns, complaints and refunds regarding your orders.
returns.section_1_text: In accordance with current regulations, you generally have a period of fourteen (14) days from receipt of your order to exercise your right of withdrawal, when this right applies. Certain product categories may be excluded from the right of withdrawal, particularly when products have been deteriorated or altered due to inappropriate storage conditions.
returns.section_2_li1: Products must be returned in a condition allowing reasonable resale.
returns.section_2_li2: Largely consumed or heavily degraded pallets generally cannot be taken back.
returns.section_2_li3: Risks related to return shipping remain the customer's responsibility, unless specifically agreed otherwise.
returns.section_3_intro: If you notice a problem during delivery (damaged pallet, missing product, opened or wet package, etc.), it is important to follow this procedure:
returns.section_3_li1: Make clear and detailed reservations on the carrier's delivery note.
returns.section_3_li2: Keep evidence (photos, videos) of the condition of products and pallets.
returns.section_3_li3: Contact our customer service as soon as possible, indicating your order number.
returns.section_4_li1: Contact our customer service via the Contact page or from your customer area.
returns.section_4_li2: Specify the reason for the return or complaint and attach photos if possible.
returns.section_4_li3: We will inform you of the practical terms for collection or return of products if applicable.
returns.section_5_intro: After reviewing your request and, if applicable, receiving the returned products, we may offer:
returns.section_5_li1: a product replacement or shipment of the missing quantity;
returns.section_5_li2: a credit usable on a future order;
returns.section_5_li3: a partial or full refund, depending on the situation and applicable regulations.

terms.intro: These general terms and conditions of sale (T&C) aim to define the rights and obligations of the parties in the context of the online sale of firewood and related products.
terms.section_1_text: The T&C apply without restriction or reservation to all orders placed on the site by individual customers for delivery in mainland France, unless specific conditions are agreed in writing.
terms.section_2_li1: Validation of the order by the customer constitutes full and complete acceptance of these T&C.
terms.section_2_li2: The customer undertakes to provide accurate and complete information (identity, address, contact details).
terms.section_2_li3: The publisher reserves the right to cancel or refuse any order in case of existing dispute.
terms.section_3_li1: Prices are indicated in euros including all taxes (incl. VAT), excluding delivery costs.
terms.section_3_li2: Delivery costs are specified before final validation of the order.
terms.section_3_li3: Payment is made according to the methods offered on the site (for example bank transfer).
terms.section_3_li4: The order is only prepared and shipped after effective validation of payment.
terms.section_4_text: Delivery terms (areas served, indicative deadlines, transfer of risks, reservations upon receipt, cases of delivery impossibility) are detailed in the Delivery Policy. In case of incomplete, incorrect address or impractical access, additional fees may be charged.
terms.section_5_title: 5. Right of Withdrawal, Returns and Refunds
terms.section_5_text: The conditions for withdrawal, product returns and refunds are specified in the Returns and Refunds policy, in compliance with applicable regulations.
terms.section_6_text: Products benefit from any applicable legal warranties. In case of non-compliance or detected defect, the customer is invited to contact customer service as soon as possible by providing any useful information (photos, detailed description, order number).
terms.section_7_text: The publisher cannot be held responsible for damages resulting from non-compliant use of products or inappropriate storage of firewood. Its liability cannot be engaged in case of force majeure or facts attributable to the customer or a third party.
terms.section_8_text: The processing of personal data carried out in the context of orders is described in the Privacy Policy. It specifies in particular the purposes, legal bases, retention periods, recipients and rights of the persons concerned.
terms.section_9_text: The publisher reserves the right to modify these T&C at any time. The applicable T&C are those in force on the day of validation of the order by the customer.
terms.section_10_text: These T&C are subject to the law applicable in the territory of product delivery. In case of dispute, an amicable solution will be sought as a priority. Failing that, competent courts may be seized.
